sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Form, Input, Button, Checkbox, Row, Col, Select, Upload, message } from 'antd';
import { UploadOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons';
import _ from 'lodash'
import {User, VisaStatus} from '../../model/model'
import FormProps from './FormProps'

const {Option} = Select

export const Form1: React.FC<FormProps> = (props) => {
    const {currentUser, changeCurrentUser, changeStep} = props

    if (currentUser == undefined) {
        return (<></>)
    }

    const onFinish = () => {
        changeCurrentUser(currentUser)
        changeStep()
    }

    const onFinishFailed = () => {}

    return (
        <Form
            name="basic"
            initialValues={{ remember: true }}
            onFinish={onFinish}
            onFinishFailed={onFinishFailed}
        >
            <Form.Item
                label="Name"
                name="firstName"
            >
                <Input.Group>
                    <Row>
                        <Col span={11}>
                            <Input disabled defaultValue={currentUser.firstName}/>
                        </Col>
                        <Col span={2}/>
                        <Col span={11}>
                            <Input disabled defaultValue={currentUser.lastName}/>
                        </Col>
                    </Row>
                </Input.Group>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Email"
                name="email"
            >
                <Input disabled defaultValue={currentUser.email}/>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Phone Number"
                name="Phone Number"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
                <Input placeholder="+1 (555) 555-5555"/>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Location"
                name="Location"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
                <Input placeholder="New York City"/>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Desired Salary"
                name="Desired Salary"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
                <Input placeholder="$100,000-$150,000 per year"/>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Preferred Role"
                name="Preferred Role"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
                <Input placeholder="UI/UX Designer"/>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Portfolio"
                name="Portfolio"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
                <Input placeholder="https://www.myportfolio.com"/>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Resume"
                name="Resume"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
            <Upload name={currentUser.firebaseId} onChange={(info) => {
                if (info.file.status !== 'uploading') {
                    console.log(info.file, info.fileList);
                }
                if (info.file.status === 'done') {
                    message.success(`${info.file.name} file uploaded successfully`);
                } else if (info.file.status === 'error') {
                message.error(`${info.file.name} file upload failed.`);
                }
            }}>
              <Button>
                <UploadOutlined /> Click to Upload
              </Button>
            </Upload>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item
                label="Visa Status"
                name="Visa Status"
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
            >
                <Select placeholder="Select an option:">
                    {_.map(VisaStatus, (status) => {
                        return <Option value={status}>{status}</Option>
                    })}
                </Select>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item 
                rules={[{ required: true }]}
                name="remember" 
                valuePropName="unchecked">
                <Checkbox>Agree to Terms and Services</Checkbox>
            </Form.Item>

            <Form.Item>
                <Row justify="center" align="middle">
                    <Button type="primary" htmlType="submit">
                        Next Page
                    </Button>
                </Row>
            </Form.Item>
        </Form>
    );
}
